getPath(Locale, Locale) - Static method in class org.synyx.messagesource.util.LocaleUtils
Returns the Message-Resolving path of a given Locale and default- Locale: Example: de_DE and en_US as default leads to: de_DE, de, en_US, en, null de_DE and null as default leads to: de_DE, de, null de_DE and de_DE as default leads to: de_DE, de, null

M

MessageAcceptor - Interface in org.synyx.messagesource
Interface for instances that are able to accept a List of Messages for a given basename This is used by Importer to import Messages from an MessageProvider to a MessageAcceptor.
